attributes.action: allow baby-hatches to be opened in the uk
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: as rape, teenage pregnancies etc. increase there are more babies being abandoned. the babyhatch system would provide a safe place for a mother to annomously abandon their baby and this should decrease the number of babies found dead or murdered, even aborted. the baby-hatch is already successful in japan, france, germany, asia and america. i am willing to start a charity that supplies a babyhatch and advice, councelling and accomodation to distressed mothers
